abstract: Dr. Manoj V. Waikar was paid just under Eli Lilly’s $75,000-a-year cap for health providers who speak or consult for the company.
snippet: Dr. Manoj V. Waikar was paid just under Eli Lilly’s $75,000-a-year cap for health providers who speak or consult for the company.
lead_paragraph: In the first half of this year, the drug giant Eli Lilly paid 3,971 doctors and other medical professionals an average of about $11,230 each. The payments were for participating in an average of 12 speaking or consulting engagements during those six months, according to a company spokeswoman.

headline.main: Sought-After Speaker, With Script Outlines From Eli Lilly
headline.print_headline: Sought-After Speaker, With Script Outlines From Eli Lilly
